movie.title: Silk
movie.description_intro: Silk, the toughest cop in Honolulu, busts small time smugglers only to reveal a larger syndicate smuggling Asian mobsters into the States by buying the identities of Hawaiian citizens.
movie.description_full: Silk, the toughest cop in Honolulu, busts small time smugglers only to reveal a larger syndicate smuggling Asian mobsters into the States by buying the identities of Hawaiian citizens.

movies.title: Death Files
movies.summary: 2 locksmiths find a flash drive at an old warehouse. One of them activates the flash drive at a computer and opens the shocking world of mysterious creatures, broken lives and violence.
movies.description_full: 2 locksmiths find a flash drive at an old warehouse. One of them activates the flash drive at a computer and opens the shocking world of mysterious creatures, broken lives and violence.
movies.synopsis: 2 locksmiths find a flash drive at an old warehouse. One of them activates the flash drive at a computer and opens the shocking world of mysterious creatures, broken lives and violence.

movies.title: The Mechanic
movies.summary: A professional hit man is planning to retire, always a difficult move for one in such a profession. A young apprentice appears to be eager to learn all the skills of the trade - but is that all he wants?
movies.description_full: A professional hit man is planning to retire, always a difficult move for one in such a profession. A young apprentice appears to be eager to learn all the skills of the trade - but is that all he wants?
movies.synopsis: A professional hit man is planning to retire, always a difficult move for one in such a profession. A young apprentice appears to be eager to learn all the skills of the trade - but is that all he wants?

movies.title: Get Out
movies.summary: Chris and his girlfriend Rose go upstate to visit her parents for the weekend. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he never could have imagined.
movies.description_full: Chris and his girlfriend Rose go upstate to visit her parents for the weekend. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

movies.title: Drift
movies.summary: In the 70s two brothers battle killer waves, conservative society and ruthless bikers to kick-start the modern surf industry.
movies.description_full: In the 70s two brothers battle killer waves, conservative society and ruthless bikers to kick-start the modern surf industry.
